About Project Contact

Hi, I’m Vani Ip

A UX Designer in London

In the past 5 years of extensive experience in designing products across a diverse range of clients and industries, including retail, food services, insurance, and the public sector, I have developed a valuable skill set that encompasses the ability to adapt swiftly to new challenges and consistently produce work that is both innovative and impactful. It empowers me to take the lead on projects, demonstrating autonomy and ownership in driving them towards successful outcomes. By combining my design thinking approach with a proactive mindset, I have been able to navigate complex tasks independently while fostering effective collaboration with team members and stakeholders. Proficient in user research, workshop facilitation, journey mapping, wireframing, high-fidelity UI design, and prototyping.

In the past 5 years of extensive experience in designing products across a diverse range of clients and industries, including retail, food services, insurance, and the public sector, I have developed a valuable skill set that encompasses the ability to adapt swiftly to new challenges and consistently produce work that is both innovative and impactful. It empowers me to take the lead on projects, demonstrating autonomy and ownership in driving them towards successful outcomes. By combining my design thinking approach with a proactive mindset, I have been able to navigate complex tasks independently while fostering effective collaboration with team members and stakeholders. Proficient in user research, workshop facilitation, journey mapping, wireframing, high-fidelity UI design, and prototyping.

Project

01/

Heathrow Airport
E-commerce Website

This project entailed an end-to-end UX design solution for the Heathrow Airport's e-commerce website. It involved a collaboration with an external supplier. A UI gap analysis and collaborative workshops were conducted to gather insights and refine requirements. High-fidelity designs were then crafted to enhance the website's visual elements and interactive features. Effective management of the design system ensured consistency across the platform. Usability testing was carried out to gather valuable user feedback and validate design decisions.

UX Workshop UX Interview & Research UI Design Discovery Stage

02/

QBE Insurance Hong Kong
Self-service Customer Portal

The project centred around the B2B2C customer portal for QBE Insurance, which aimed to provide policyholders with convenient access to their policy details, claims reporting, and document downloads. The objective was to identify and address any existing UX issues within the current portal, revamp the user flow and create a seamless user journey tailored to meet the needs of end customers.

Insurtech Responsive Website Style Guide No-code Prototype

03/

Ruby Tuesday
Mobile Ordering App

This project focused on revamping the mobile application of Ruby Tuesday. Market research and client interviews were conducted to gain insights into the concerns, requirements, and goals. Building upon these findings, an analysis of the user journey was undertaken to develop a design solution that simplified menu browsing, ordering, and checkout processes for in-store dining and takeout. The aim was to deliver a seamless customer experience that surpassed their expectations.

Food Service Mobile App Wireflow UI Design
